data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Patitucci, Luciano Damián, Mulieri, Pablo Ricardo, Domínguez, M. Cecilia, Mariluis, Juan Carlos (2015): The type specimens of Calyptratae (Diptera) housed in non-traditional institutions in Argentina. Zootaxa 3905 (4): 557-572, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.4.8
